comments.value: #    When I access the "Home" from header
#    And verify the Home page has been accessed
#    And I take the screenshot as "Header1-Home.jpg"
#    And I close the messenger pop up
#    And I access the "SHOPIFY APPS" from header
#    And verify the Shopify Apps page has been accessed
#    And I take the screenshot as "Header2-ShopifyApps.jpg"
#    And I access the "Blog" from header
#    And verify the Blog page has been accessed
#    And I take the screenshot as "Header3-Blog.jpg"
#    And I access the "Affiliate" from header
#    And verify the Affiliate page has been accessed
#    And I access the "Get App Now" from header
#    And verify the FireApps app store has been accessed
#    And I take the screenshot as "Header5-GetAppNow.jpg"
#    Then I return to Home page

steps.name: I access the website
I click on Get App Now button
verify the Shopify Apps page has been accessed
I access the "Home" from header
I close the messenger pop up
I check the Ali Review app from the slider
verify the Previous button is disabled
I take the screenshot as "HomePage1-AliReviewSlide.jpg"
I click to Get App button of "Ali Reviews" app
verify the "Ali Reviews" install page appears
I check the Ali Hunter app from the slider
I take the screenshot as "HomePage2-AliHunterSlide.jpg"
I click to Get App button of "Ali Hunter" app
verify the "Ali Hunter" install page appears
I check the Ali Orders app from the slider
I take the screenshot as "HomePage3-AliOrdersSlide.jpg"
I click to Get App button of "Ali Orders" app
verify the "Ali Orders" install page appears
I check the Sales Box app from the slider
verify the Next button is disabled
I take the screenshot as "HomePage4-SalesBoxSlide.jpg"
I click to Get App button of "Sales Box" app
verify the "Sales Box" install page appears
I back to Home page
I wait for testimonial slide "1" display and take the screenshot
I wait for testimonial slide "2" display and take the screenshot
I wait for testimonial slide "3" display and take the screenshot
I wait for testimonial slide "4" display and take the screenshot
I wait for testimonial slide "5" display and take the screenshot
I wait for testimonial slide "6" display and take the screenshot
I wait for testimonial slide "7" display and take the screenshot
I wait for testimonial slide "8" display and take the screenshot

steps.name: I check the "1st" blog post at Home page work well
I return to Home page
I check the "2nd" blog post at Home page work well
I return to Home page
I check the "3rd" blog post at Home page work well

name: Check functions for Home page Fireapps.io
description:
As a user
I want to check all functions of Home page
